Subjects: grace, at meals; Margaret, saint; Katherine of Alexandria, saint; Virgin Mary; grace, at meals
_description: A grace before meat to SS. Katherine, Mary and Margaret — four quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
Besechyn benygnely euery creatureThat present ben & affterward
                    shal…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…Wherfore beþ mery I pray you hertlyAnd blesse you all
                    þis mayde margaret
TCD432.Editions:
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 135-6.
